issue.subject: Improved collaboration alerts for Redmine
issue.description:
Owner = Assigned
Collaborators = "Watchers" for Discord? (can turn off email- user setting)
Due date, after which you have to give up the task by default (max 1 month)
Your list is public
Encourage people to carve out sub tickets
Only one owner and you can add yourself as Watcher 
Can you at mention watchers in a thread?
You can co own by creating a group

Asks:
* Command: "Alert" on a ticket/thread: if you're in a thread, it will know what ticket to alert on
* Command: "add yourself as a watcher" for a ticket via Discord
* Addition to "new" command- attach to a current ticket (as a sub ticket?)- this becomes a new thread
* Unassign tickets that have not been touched for a certain amount of time eg 4 weeks- back to ticket intake, status back to new, send an alert to collaborators
* Tracker to Discord channel mapping:
- External Comms Intake- admin-team
- Admin- admin-team
- Outreach-Partnerships- outreach
- Infra-config- routing and infrastructure
- Infra-field- installs
- Software-dev- network software
- Research- uw research nsf

children.subject: "Alert" cron job that runs daily to send notifications about expiring tickets.
Add command to create new sub-ticket in context of an existing ticket thread
Add automatic resolution for trackers <--> Discord channels
Add "unassign" command to send a ticket back to intake
Add auto-assignment for specificed known email senders
